data.markdown:
[Introducing OpenClaw →](https://openclaw.ai/blog/introducing-openclaw)

## What People Say

[View all community shoutouts →](https://openclaw.ai/shoutouts)

---

**@jonahships_**

> "Setup @openclaw by @steipete yesterday. All I have to say is, wow. First I was using my Claude Max sub and I used all of my limit quickly, so today I had my claw bot setup a proxy to route my CoPilot subscription as a API endpoint so now it runs on that. It's the fact that claw can just keep building upon itself just by talking to it in discord is crazy. The future is already here"

---

**@AryehDubois**

> "Tried Claw by @steipete. I tried to build my own AI assistant bots before, and I am very impressed how many hard things Claw gets right. Persistent memory, persona onboarding, comms integration, heartbeats. A few minor wrinkles remain, but the end result is AWESOME."

---

**@markjaquith**

> "I've been saying for like six months that even if LLMs suddenly stopped improving, we could spend years discovering new transformative uses. @openclaw feels like that kind of 'just had to glue all the parts together' leap forward. Incredible experience."

---

## Quick Start

One-liner / npm / Hackable (macOS)

```bash
# Works everywhere. Installs everything. You're welcome.
curl -fsSL https://openclaw.ai/install.sh | bash

# Install OpenClaw
npm i -g openclaw

# Meet your lobster
openclaw onboard
```

Companion App (Beta) — Menubar access to your lobster. [Download for macOS](https://github.com/openclaw/openclaw/releases/latest)

## What It Does

- **Runs on Your Machine** — Mac, Windows, or Linux. Private by default.
- **Any Chat App** — WhatsApp, Telegram, Discord, Slack, Signal, or iMessage.
- **Persistent Memory** — Remembers you and becomes uniquely yours.
- **Browser Control** — Browse the web, fill forms, extract data.
- **Skills & Plugins** — Extend with community skills or build your own.

## Stay in the Loop

Get updates on new features and lobster wisdom. [Subscribe](https://openclaw.ai)

data.summary: OpenClaw is a powerful open-source AI assistant praised for its flexibility, persistent memory, and integration capabilities across various platforms like WhatsApp, Telegram, and Discord. It allows users to install it locally on their machines, controlling their data and preferences privately.
